Articles.Content: I don't know if this happens to many others, but for me, it happens. Whenever I send a plane, or a rover, or anything with wheels/landing gear on it, the wheels seem to sink into the runway. It doesn't do this with the regular ground, or any other part of KSC. Heck, it doesn't even do it with the slanted sides of the runway, just the tarmac part. It does this regardless of any mods installed, I just have it on the modded support forum, since I currently have them installed. So, if anyone has this issue, or can solve it, please reply as soon as you can. Thanks.
Ok, I've figured out that it only does this with the cars/trucks/rover from KSOS mod. Stock wheels are fine.

In 0.90 the KSOS wheels did that when you attached them in the wrong direction. With the reworked attachement nodes of 1.0 I don't know if there's still a correct direction to attach them. You should probably ask in the KSOS thread.
